text: unhone kaha ke agar us ne chori ki (to koyi taâ€™ajjub ki baath nahi) us ka bhai bhi pehle chori kar choka hai, yousuf (alaihissallaam) ne us baat ko apne dil mein rakh liya aur un ke saamne bilkul zaaher na kiya, kaha ke tum badtar jageh mein ho, aur jo tum bayaan karte ho, ose Allah hee qoob jaanta hai
